Details

Dive into the ultimate horror trivia experience with Terror Trivia on iOS! Unleash your inner horror aficionado as you test your knowledge across movies, TV, novels, and video games. From iconic horror films to spine-chilling TV series, immerse yourself in the darkest corners of entertainment history. Explore the twisted tales of terrifying novels and unravel the mysteries of haunting video games. Think you have what it takes? Answer questions swiftly to earn more tokens and climb the leaderboard. The faster you answer, the more tokens you'll earn to unlock new quizzes and prove your mastery of all things macabre. Are you ready to face the ultimate challenge in horror trivia? Download Terror Trivia now and let the terror begin!
